remarks: Subtraction of reciprocals.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Jan-2017.)
statement:
subrecd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
subrecd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subrecd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
subrecd.4 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
subrecd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1 / A ) - ( 1 / B ) ) = ( ( B - A ) / ( A x. B ) ) ) $.
